DataLayer

Class DataFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataLayer.DataFacade

  • public class DataFacade
extends Object
    Author:
    sofieamalielandt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataFacade()
      Initializes a newly created UserMapper, MaterialMapper and CarportMapper for further use in methods and sets datasource for the connector.

        public void removeShed(Carport carport)
                throws DataException

        carport - - the carport where shed_id and shed are removed from in database
